snippet: The agency said such unverified reporting, from which many news outlets later retreated, could have “unintended consequences” for its investigation.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation scolds several news outlets for mistakenly reporting that arrest had been made in Boston Marathon bombings, and warns that such unverified reporting could have 'unintended consequences' for its investigation.
lead_paragraph: The agency said such unverified reporting, from which many news outlets later retreated, could have “unintended consequences” for its investigation.

headline.main: The F.B.I. Criticizes the News Media After Several Mistaken Reports of an Arrest
headline.print_headline: The F.B.I. Criticizes the News Media After Several Mistaken Reports of an Arrest
